How to start a blog!

August 02, 2019

I have decided to start a blog. “Yay!!” I hear you all crying. Since this is the my first ever post on my first ever blog, I figured that I would start this blog by talking about how to start a blog. That way we can both try to learn something togeather.

Different Approaches To Creating A Blog

Contrary to The Zen of Python, in the world of computing(like in life), there are often more than one way to do things. This is no different when it comes to blogging. A lot of options exist if you are interested in starting your own blog. These include:

  1. A blogging platform like Wordpress(or a million others),
  2. Creating a blog from a template or creating the html from scratch, and
  3. Using a static site builder like Jekyll, GatsbyJS, or Hugo(my personal favorite)

Ok. You’re right. The 2nd and the 3rd are similar. But there are key differences!

So, what are these differences? And we should include the first option in this comparison.

The first of these options is the most popular, and in my opinion the worst. This is usually the first place people look when they decide to create a blog. And this makes since, they are simple to use and lots of documentation, plugins, and themes expist for them. However, in exchange for this convenience, you are giving up lots of flexability in the form of custimizability. Also, these platforms are often expensive and difficult to migrate away from.

The second approach most people take is to create a blog in pure html(possibly copying and pasting html between pages). This
